mil7.5.8:1.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘gorūpassa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.5.8:1.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, gorūpo sakaṁ gehaṁ na vijahati;
mil7.5.8:1.3_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sako kāyo na vijahitabbo ‘aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanavikiraṇaviddhaṁsanadhammo ayaṁ kāyo’ti.
mil7.5.8:1.4_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, gorūpassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.5.8:2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, gorūpo ādinnadhuro sukhadukkhena dhuraṁ vahati;
mil7.5.8:2.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ādinnabrahmacariyena sukhadukkhena yāva jīvitapariyādānā āpāṇakoṭikaṁ brahmacariyaṁ caritabbaṁ.
mil7.5.8:2.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, gorūpassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.5.8:3.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, gorūpo chandena ghāyamāno pānīyaṁ pivati;
mil7.5.8:3.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ācariyupajjhāyānaṁ anusiṭṭhi chandena pemena pasādena ghāyamānena paṭiggahetabbā.
mil7.5.8:3.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, gorūpassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.5.8:4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, gorūpo yena kenaci vāhiyamāno vahati;
mil7.5.8:4.2_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena theranavamajjhimabhikkhūnampi gihiupāsakassāpi ovādānusāsanī sirasā sampaṭicchitabbā.
mil7.5.8:4.3_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, gorūpassa catutthaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
